verbs.description: [ARG0: We all] [V: want] [ARG1: to live as long as we can] . Most of us draw the line at doing whatever it takes . Some are driven so insane by the knowledge of their own mortality they will do whatever they can to avoid it or put it off . Unfortunately , Trump can do ...
